Description: Bling Jewelry Large Antique Style Motorcycle Biker Mens Pocket Watch Rhodium Plated Product Features: Rustic Silver Plated Motorcycle Pocket WatchArabic Numbers on Analog Watch FaceMaterial: Alloy, Silver PlatingMeasure: 14.75 inch L x 1.75 inch WWeight: 73.83 Grams Product Description If you are looking for adventure, you can head out on the highway in style with this motorcycle pocket watch. Antique Style silver plating gives this biker pocket watch a classic style. The center of this mens watch is a Vintage Style motorcycle that has highly intricate detailing giving it a lifelike look. The boarder and bow, or handle, of this pocket watch has subtle floral detailing that lends a soft touch to a bold design. The back of this piece of biker jewelry showcases a scroll like leaf motif. A curb chain allows this piece of mens jewelry to dangle from any belt or coat. These Antique Style pocket watches feature Arabic style numbers along a white dial to mark the hours. These cool watches make the perfect fathers day gifts.
